TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，这种类型的异常<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>在于<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>表示意义上的常用的编译器错误，针对绑定失败，而<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>表示运行时联编程序本身的故障。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>会考虑当前系统的系统提供描述诸如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"此消息的错误消息的新实例的属性区域性。
下表显示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 的实例的初始属性值。
|属性|“值”| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`。| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> 的实例的初始属性值。
|属性|“值”| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`。| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

Docs.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> 的实例的初始属性值。
|属性|“值”| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`。| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。|
